==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
===Dialogue Set #1===
:'''Katari:''' (A worn-out Yumkasaur. They don't look like they're in the mood to talk.)
:'''Katari:''' (It's a good thing they can't talk even if they were in the mood.)

===Dialogue Set #2===
;(Talk to Katari while indwelling a [[Saurian]])
:'''Katari:''' Ugh, all I've done lately is listening to those humans go on and on...
:'''Katari:''' Sorry, I'm not in the mood for a chat... Don't think I'll be in the mood tomorrow, either.

===Dialogue Set #3===
;(Talk to Katari while indwelling a [[Saurian]] after completing [[The Rainbow Destined to Burn]])
:'''Katari:''' The sight of [[Hunza]] charging into battle... As fast as he used to speak.
:'''Katari:''' It feels so long since I last heard him rambling on. Perhaps I'll never hear it again.
:'''Katari:''' Sorry, I'm not in the mood for a chat... Don't think I'll be in the mood tomorrow, either.
{{Dialogue End}}
